title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30
text:
DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to April 30 Published 7:02 PM ET Thu, 1 March 2018 Reuters 
For other diaries, please see: 
Top Economic Events 
This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events 

FRIDAY, MARCH 2 
** MANILA - Stefano Manservisi, director-general of European Commission for Development Cooperation, holds a news conference to discuss impact of development assistance rejected by the Philippines government in poor communities in the south - 0500 GMT. 
SINGAPORE - 24th ASEAN Economic Ministers' Retreat (AEM-R) and 16th AEMEU Trade Commissioner Consultations (Final day). 
PRAGUE - European Central Bank Executive Board member Yves Mersch speaks at the KPMG Finance Forum 2018 - 0800 GMT. 
TUESDAY, MARCH 6 MANILA Philippines' central bank Governor Nestor Espenilla participating at the Management Association of the Philippines' economic briefing 0330 GMT. SYDNEY - Speech by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the AFR Business Summit, Sydney 2135 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy council meeting (to March 7). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia interest rate meeting 0330 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 7 
ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting. TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia monetary policy committee meeting. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia interest rate decision. 
THURSDAY, MARCH 8 
LIMA Central bank of Peru interest rate decision. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. 
MONDAY, MARCH 12 
SYDNEY - Speech by Michele Bullock, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the Seamless Australia Payments Conference 2340 GMT. 
TUESDAY, MARCH 13 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. 
SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the KangaNews DCM Summit 2205 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 14 ANKARA - Central Bank of the Republic of Turkey releases the minutes of its March monetary policy committee meeting. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its February 2018 rate-setting meeting 1300 GMT. 
THURSDAY, MARCH 15 SWITZERLAND - Swiss National Bank (SNB) to assess monetary policy 0830GMT. SYDNEY - Speech by Guy Debelle, RBA Deputy Governor, at the Financial Risk Day - 2245 GMT. 
MONDAY, MARCH 19 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile monetary policy meeting (to March 20). ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria monetary policy meeting (to March 20). 
TUESDAY, MARCH 20 SYDNEY - Panel participation by Michele Bullock, Assistant Governor (Financial System), at the ASIC Annual Forum 2018, Sydney 0415 GMT. BRASILIA - Central Bank of Brazil monetary policy committee meeting (to March 21). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting 0030 GMT. RABAT - Bank of Morocco monetary policy meeting. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 21 
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank board of governors meeting. (to March 22). 
THURSDAY, MARCH 22 MANILA - Philippines Central Bank monetary policy meeting. 
FRIDAY, MARCH 23 
MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. 
MONDAY, MARCH 26 CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three-day monetary policy committee meeting (to March 28). 
TUESDAY, MARCH 27 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Investment Implementation Summit 0045 GMT. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland monetary policy meeting. No interest rate announcement is expected. 
WEDNESDAY, MARCH 28 
BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting. 
THURSDAY, MARCH 29 
SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meetings to announce interest rates. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt monetary policy committee meeting. PRAGUE - Czech National Bank monetary policy meeting. 
WEDNESDAY, ARPIL 4 
TIRANA Bank of Albania's Financial Stability Report 2017 H2. COLOMBO - Central Bank of Sri Lanka monetary policy report. 
FRIDAY, APRIL 6 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its March 2018 monetary policy meeting. 
TUESDAY, APRIL 10 BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 11 BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its March 2018 rate-setting meeting 1200 GMT. ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank monetary policy meeting. 
THURSDAY, APRIL 12 BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. 
FRIDAY, APRIL 13 KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting. 
MONDAY, APRIL 16 
JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina holds press conference on monetary policy report. 
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT. 
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting. 
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting. 
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
